mapper.insert: insert into account (ACC_ID, ACC_PASSWORD, ACC_POSTCODE, ACC_ADDR, ACC_DETAIL_ADDR, ACC_NAME, ACC_BIRTH, ACC_TEL, ACC_EMAIL) values(#{accId},#{accPassword},#{accPostCode},#{accAddr},#{accDetailAddr},#{accName},#{accBirth},#{accTel},#{accEmail})
mapper.select: select ACC_ID as accId, ACC_PASSWORD as accPassword, ACC_NAME as accName, ACC_BIRTH as accBirth, ACC_TEL as accTel, ACC_EMAIL as accEmail, ACC_ADMIN as accAdmin, ACC_POSTCODE as accPostCode, ACC_ADDR as accAddr, ACC_DETAIL_ADDR as accDetailAddr, ACC_PNT as accPnt, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), ACC_JOIN_DT)+1 as accJoinDays from account where ACC_ID=#{accId}
